title: Training Program for Rational Decision-Making Styles in Scientific Entrepreneurship

context.prior_knowledge: Basic entrepreneurship concepts and understanding of scientific problem-solving methodologies
context.additional_context: Focused on enhancing entrepreneurial decision-making capabilities through scientific approaches for learners with fieldwork experience

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the four decision-making styles (rational, dependent, avoidant, intuitive)
Learners achieve 80% or higher application of rational decision-making through entrepreneurial scenario-based activity assessments
Learners can write decision-making improvement plans incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
